skill.name: agent.skills.TransportACrowd
skill.description: To transport a 'Crowd' agent toward a given destination. Depending on its crowd transport capacity, agent will make as many round trips as necessary between 'loadingPoint' and the 'destination'. Because tha agent can only transports crowds' concentrations, this skill needs a loading position to indicate which concentration to transport. Indeed, a crowd can be compouded with several separated concentrations. Only one concentration can be transported at a time. The agent will transport the nearest concentration from the "loadingPoint" parameter.

parameter.name: loadingPoint
parameter.description: The crowd's concentration position onto which the agent loads the elements of the crowd.

parameter.name: destination
parameter.description: The destination onto which the agent must bring the crowd.

parameter.name: minDistance
parameter.description: The minimum distance (in METERS) between the loading position and the crowd's concentration. The loading position is used to verifiy that the concentration to transport is not moving. If the distance between the crowd concentration to transport and the loading position is greater than the 'minDistance' value, the agent waits the crowd to get closer.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: Used to make round trips between the loading position and the destination.
